text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1915 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ==Births== ; January * 9 – Olga Marie Mikalsen, singer (died 2006). * 23 – Aage Samuelsen, evangelist, singer, and composer (died 1987). ; February * 3 – Henki Kolstad, singer and actor (died 2008) ; May * 8 – Arvid Fladmoe, composer and conductor (died 1993). ; September * 3 – Knut Nystedt, orchestral and choral composer (died 2014). * 23 – Finn Arnestad, contemporary composer and musician (died 1994). ; November * 2 – Sverre Bergh, composer, pianist, and orchestra conductor (died 1980). * 14 – Jens Book Jenssen, singer, songwriter, revue artist, and theatre director (died 1998). ==See also== * 1915 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1910s in Norwegian music
title: 1915 in Norwegian music
